title: Can I get admission in BAMS without the NEET entrance exams? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Hello Medical Aspirants. Thanx for A2A. Although in year 2019 in some states students without NEET UG exam were allowed to take admission. But what will be the scenario in 2020 ,it will depends and may be decided later. If you wanted to know the complete Admission process of 2019 you can visit our website -getmbbsadmission. Hope this answer will help you to get admission in good college. Best of Luck !!!
